alert.note: Alert for Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 06 at 11:25AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Marin County through NOON PST... At 1124 AM PST, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Stinson Beach, or 9 miles southwest of San Rafael, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mill Valley, Larkspur, Corte Madera, Tiburon, Sausalito, Tamalpais-Homestead, Strawberry, Muir Beach, Tamalpais-Homestead Valley, Stinson Beach, Kentfield, Belvedere and Bolinas. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal North Bay Including Point Reyes National Seashore; Marin Coastal Range; North Bay Interior Valleys
